/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the cityscape. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a corridor of urban life. The buildings, mostly white and gray, rise in the background, their windows reflecting the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting against the gray and white of the buildings and the blue of the sky. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of depth to the scene.
